DOC.brief_summary: This study enroll 20 adult Hispanic woman . Participants apply 4 % hydroquinone cream twice daily affect area face 14 week half face peel 20-30 % salicylic acid every two week total 4 peel . The first two peel 20 % salicylic acid second two peel 30 % salicylic acid . The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy salicylic acid combine 4 % hydroquinone versus 4 % hydroquinone alone .
DOC.brief_title: Salicylic Acid Peels Combined With 4 % Hydroquinone Treatment Moderate Severe Melasma Hispanic Women
DOC.criteria: Hispanic woman age 1865 year age moderate severe melasma English Spanishspeaking woman Pregnant breastfeed woman Subjects use 4 % hydroquinone within 3 month study start Subjects use chemical peel , microdermabrasion facial laser treatment within 9 month study start
